    • Constructor Detail

      • TCPServerOp

        public TCPServerOp()
            throws java.io.IOException
        The class constructor. This method also creates a directory where server's file will be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when fails to create the directory

    • Method Detail

      • getUsersFile

        public static java.lang.String getUsersFile()
        This static function returns the relative path of the user's backup file.
        Returns:
        the relative path of the user's backup file

      • register

        public int register(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
           java.io.BufferedReader r)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This function implements the user registration in the server.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when registration is completed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on IOError

      • login

        public int login(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
        java.io.BufferedReader r)
          throws java.io.IOException
        This function implements the first login phase in the server. This function also creates a new authorization token.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the first login phase is completed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on IOError

      • request

        public int request(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
          java.io.BufferedReader r)
            throws java.io.IOException
        This function processes a friendship request. This function also checks whether the user's authorization token is expired or not, if so provides a new login for the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the request processing is completed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on IOError

      • confirmRequest

        public int confirmRequest(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
                 java.io.BufferedReader r)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This function processes a friendship request confirmation. This function also checks whether the user's authorization token is expired or not, if so provides a new login for the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the confirmation processing is completed, -1 if there's an IOError during the confirmation processing
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs during the user's authentication.

      • search

        public int search(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
         java.io.BufferedReader r)
           throws java.io.IOException
        This function processes a search request. This function also checks whether the user's authorization token is expired or not, if so provides a new login for the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the search processing is completed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs.

      • listFriends

        public int listFriends(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
              java.io.BufferedReader r)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This function sends the requesting user his friends list. This function also checks whether the user's authorization token is expired or not, if so provides a new login for the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the all friends are sent, -1 if there's an IOError while sending friends.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs during the user's authentication.

      • post

        public int post(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
       java.io.BufferedReader r)
         throws java.io.IOException
        This function posts a new content and sends it to all user's followers. This function also checks whether the user's authorization token is expired or not, if so provides a new login for the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the content is posted and sent to all user's followers, or locally stored for those offline followers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs during the user's authentication.

      • logout

        public int logout(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
         java.io.BufferedReader r)
           throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                  java.io.IOException
        This function logs-out the requesting user.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Returns:
        0 when the logout processing is completed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if UID is not a valid number.
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs.

      • send

        public static void send(java.lang.String msg,
        java.io.BufferedWriter userWriter)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This function sends msg to userWriter
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be sent
        userWriter - the BufferedWriter where to write msg
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On input error.
        See Also:
        IOException

      • findUserFromName

        public static ServerUser findUserFromName(java.lang.String uName)
        This function search an user by user-name. If there's an user with the specified user-name then returns it, if not so, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        uName - the user-name to be searched.
        Returns:
        ServerUser u such that u.userName == uName if found, null otherwise.

      • findUser

        public static ServerUser findUser(long uid)
        This function search an user by UID. If there's an user with the specified UID then returns it, if not so, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        uid - the UID to be searched.
        Returns:
        ServerUser u such that u.UID == uid if found, null otherwise.

      • follow

        public void follow(java.io.BufferedWriter w,
          java.io.BufferedReader r)
            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                   java.io.IOException
        This method ensures that on a follow request the requesting user authentication token is still valid.
        Parameters:
        w - the client socket OutputStream
        r - the client socket InputStream
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if UID is not a valid number.
        java.io.IOException - if an IOError occurs.
